member.name: T:Fingerprint.Contract.AndroidFingerprintImplementationBase
member.summary: Base implementation for the Android implementations.

member.name: T:Zebble.FingerprintAvailability
member.summary: Indicates if a fingerprint authentication can be performed.

member.name: F:Zebble.FingerprintAvailability.Available
member.summary: Fingerprint authentication can be used.

member.name: F:Zebble.FingerprintAvailability.NoImplementation
member.summary: This plugin has no implementation for the current platform.

member.name: F:Zebble.FingerprintAvailability.NoApi
member.summary: Operating system has no supported fingerprint API.

member.name: F:Zebble.FingerprintAvailability.NoPermission
member.summary: App is not allowed to access the fingerprint sensor.

member.name: F:Zebble.FingerprintAvailability.NoSensor
member.summary: Device has no fingerprint sensor.

member.name: F:Zebble.FingerprintAvailability.NoFingerprint
member.summary: Fingerprint has not been set up.

member.name: F:Zebble.FingerprintAvailability.Unknown
member.summary: An unknown, platform specific error occurred. Availability status could not be mapped to a .

member.name: M:Zebble.IFingerprint.GetAvailabilityAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks the availability of fingerprint authentication. Checks are performed in this order: 1. API supports accessing the fingerprint sensor 2. Permission for accessint the fingerprint sensor granted 3. Device has sensor 4. Fingerprint has been enrolled will be returned if the check failed with some other platform specific reason.
member.param: En-/Disables the use of the PIN / Passwort as fallback. Supported Platforms: iOS, Mac Default: false

member.name: M:Zebble.IFingerprint.IsAvailableAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks if returns .
member.param: En-/Disables the use of the PIN / Passwort as fallback. Supported Platforms: iOS, Mac Default: false

member.name: M:Zebble.IFingerprint.AuthenticateAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Requests the authentication.
member.param: Reason for the fingerprint authentication request. Displayed to the user.
Token used to cancel the operation.

member.name: M:Zebble.IFingerprint.AuthenticateAsync(Zebble.AuthenticationRequestConfiguration,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Requests the authentication.
member.param: Configuration of the dialog that is displayed to the user.
Token used to cancel the operation.

member.name: P:Zebble.FingerprintAuthenticationResult.Authenticated
member.summary: Indicatates whether the authentication was successful or not.

member.name: P:Zebble.FingerprintAuthenticationResult.Status
member.summary: Detailed information of the authentication.

member.name: P:Zebble.FingerprintAuthenticationResult.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Reason for the unsucessful authentication.

member.name: T:Zebble.AuthenticationRequestConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration of the stuff presented to the user.

member.name: P:Zebble.AuthenticationRequestConfiguration.Reason
member.summary: Reason of the authentication request.

member.name: P:Zebble.AuthenticationRequestConfiguration.CancelTitle
member.summary: Title of the cancel button.

member.name: P:Zebble.AuthenticationRequestConfiguration.FallbackTitle
member.summary: Title of the fallback button.

member.name: P:Zebble.AuthenticationRequestConfiguration.UseDialog
member.summary: En-/Disables the dialog. Supported Platforms: Android Default: true

member.name: P:Zebble.AuthenticationRequestConfiguration.HelpTexts
member.summary: Shown when a recoverable error has been encountered during authentication. The help strings are provided to give the user guidance for what went wrong. If a string is null or empty, the string provided by Android is shown. Supported Platforms: Android (when UseDialog is true)

member.name: P:Zebble.AuthenticationRequestConfiguration.AllowAlternativeAuthentication
member.summary: En-/Disables the use of the PIN / Passwort as fallback. Supported Platforms: iOS, Mac Default: false

member.name: P:Zebble.AuthenticationHelpTexts.MovedTooFast
member.summary: The fingerprint image was incomplete due to quick motion.

member.name: P:Zebble.AuthenticationHelpTexts.MovedTooSlow
member.summary: The fingerprint image was unreadable due to lack of motion.

member.name: P:Zebble.AuthenticationHelpTexts.Partial
member.summary: Only a partial fingerprint image was detected.

member.name: P:Zebble.AuthenticationHelpTexts.Insufficient
member.summary: The fingerprint image was too noisy to process due to a detected condition.

member.name: P:Zebble.AuthenticationHelpTexts.Dirty
member.summary: The fingerprint image was too noisy due to suspected or detected dirt on the sensor.
